title: Káposztás utcai Stadion
text:
The Káposztás utcai Stadion is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Sopron">Sopron</a>, <a href="Hungary">Hungary</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home stadium of <a href="MFC%20Sopron">MFC Sopron</a>. The stadium is able to hold 5,300 people and was reconstructed in 2003.
History.
On 30 September 2015, it was announced that <a href="Szombathelyi%20Halad%C3%A1s">Szombathelyi Haladás</a> would play 6 home matches at the stadium in spring in 2016. <a href="Szombathelyi%20Halad%C3%A1s">Szombathelyi Haladás</a> would host <a href="Di%C3%B3sgy%C5%91ri%20VTK">Diósgyőr</a>, <a href="%C3%9Ajpest%20FC">Újpest</a>, <a href="B%C3%A9k%C3%A9scsaba%201912%20El%C5%91re">Békéscsaba</a>, <a href="Vasas%20SC">Vasas</a>, <a href="Debreceni%20VSC">Debrecen</a>, and <a href="Ferencv%C3%A1rosi%20TC%20%28football%29">Ferencváros</a> at Káposztás utca during the demolition of <a href="Rohonci%20%C3%BAti%20Stadion">Rohonci úti Stadion</a>.
In the <a href="2016%E2%80%9317%20Nemzeti%20Bajnoks%C3%A1g%20I">2016–17 Nemzeti Bajnokság I</a> season <a href="Szombathelyi%20Halad%C3%A1s">Szombathelyi Haladás</a> played their home matches in the stadium due to the construction of their new stadium, <a href="Halad%C3%A1s%20Sportkomplexum">Haladás Sportkomplexum</a> in <a href="Szombathely">Szombathely</a>.
